subject: about order
description_text:
Hi, I bought a product from you with a tracking number  SF3266674915548
<https://www.simsonn.com/_t/c/v3/AABQXSTXK5FJwFdm6ggu6KuThw2nUF4ynlAy6qp_c23sxODjYwJBauZEi9stKD4p5uEyZHn2U3RTXVFGMY51xOfXuyjQ0xHgFASjYSGCfPElep7hcxgQ-dTCyBZwE7nGXAhzpXnFWYVRNK_pBqipcV332w5ZOBzJtZJKxscOknmYkj8MbK7ugTKf5DTBcFn6iAjsLwYCDNaQkUYuGBq1ASo7Ra-naWYfaSEhlTtT-hxkrw8blBp0At6qNoO42h8UrBtliyTVO9XxUkBkeIize9MQEem8flfsMSfKkfrFVB2fBLFhw2_VB7Kxk1PLaNGif0B5wjuH7HDGZhcHi33ubxD627Zh_rTP5cUVTxrDM05GIg==>
. I have already paid for express shipping and now you're telling me that
the estimated delivery date is 7-1-26 while the order was placed on
23-11-25... would like you to inform me immediately because you have paid,
it should be between 3 and 7 days.

conversations.body_text: Hi bill pernetzis,    Here is your UPS link. Your package is expected to arrive within the next couple of days.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1Z144AW70436580065/trackdetails
